articles.title: Watch: Europe's first 'lightning hunter' captures lightning spectacle over Europe & Africa - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) has released the first images of the crackle of lightning over Europe, Africa, and the Atlantic Ocean. The images were captured by its 'lightning hunter' satellite, the first Meteosat Third Generation satellite, which
